message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that amount?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $105. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking of a price around $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that amount?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $110. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. Let me know if it works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $108. I'll sell it to you for $109. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $107 for the product. Would you be willing to accept that price?

Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than $109, and I think that's a very fair price considering the value of the product. I'm not willing to sell it to you for $107. If you're still interested, I'm willing to sell it to you for $109, but if not, I'll consider selling it to John for $80.
